verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy word is a lamp unto my feet And a light unto my path. Thy word is a lamp unto my feet And a light unto my path.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When I feel afraid, think I’ve lost my way Still You’re there right beside me. Nothing will I fear as long as you are near. Please be near me to the end.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy word is a lamp unto my feet And a light unto my path. Thy word is a lamp unto my feet And a light unto my path.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will not forget Your love for me And yet my heart forever is wandering. Jesus be my guide, hold me to Your side, And I will love You to the end.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nothing will I fear as long as You are near. Please be near me to the end.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy word is a lamp unto my feet And a light unto my path. Thy word is a lamp unto my feet And a light unto my path.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And a light unto my path, You’re the light unto my path.{/lang-eng}
